channel.title: Authors on Fence
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Fence

item.title: Charles-Edouard Brétéché
item.description: Charles-Edouard Brétéché is a Staff Engineer at Nirmata, a maintainer for Kyverno, and has created and contributed to various open source projects. including a Terraform provider for kOps. He has been building and delivering software for more than 20 years, as a software engineer, SRE, platform engineer, devops engineer and software architect.

item.title: Sara Qasmi
item.description: Sara Qasmi, a freelance platform engineer, is driven by her passion for constructing secure and reliable Kubernetes platforms. With a varied background spanning software engineering and DevOps, she is deeply engaged in advancing modern platforms that empower businesses to innovate and scale seamlessly.
